sections.MISSION:
B TRP, 1/2CR conduct CBRN lane IVO Kohlberg Markt (33U TQ 8492 9594) NLT 24 1200 2022 IOT build unit cohesiveness and assess Soldier’s ability to compete as a team.
Leader’s
sections.PURPOSE: of this event is to assess Spur Candidate proficiency in CBRN drills and worthiness to earn Spurs.
sections.EXECUTION:
}:
Lane Validation on 22 JUN
All Spur Candidates successfully demonstrate ability to don and clear Gas Mask in under 9 seconds.
Lane Conducted, Cleared, and Reset in under 55 minutes
sections.END STATE:
/Training Outcomes:
All Spur Candidates safely demonstrate CBRN proficiency and worthiness to earn Spurs
Concept of the Operation
Candidates arrive at the lane station 1, stage rucks, SI check, and immediately are briefed and validate EIB standard gas mask donning and clearing. Candidates who incorrectly perform the sequence will perform corrective exercises
Candidates will move to station 2 (with PROMASK on) and begin shuttle test. In 4 minutes, each member of the team must move 1x casualty 50m down and back on a litter using 2x Soldier carry, 2x water cans 50 m down and back, and 20 push ups. (Each Soldier will do at least 1 litter carry, 1 water can carry, and 20 push ups)
Failure to complete in 4 minutes will result in 5 burpees assessed for each additional 10 seconds over time
Candidates will move back to their rucks, conduct SI checks, and move to Spur Ride lane 4 (33U TQ 8383 9486)
